verses.verse: Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8104>them,<s%> "You have kept all that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8085>you,<s%> and have listened to my <S%H6963>voice<s%> in all that I commanded <S%H6680>you.<s%>

You have not <S%H5800>left<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> these <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> but have <S%H4931>performed<s%> the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Now <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5117>rest<s%> to your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> as he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6437>them.<s%> Therefore now return and <S%H3212>go<s%> to your <S%H168>tents,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession,<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

Only take <S%H3966>diligent<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H157>you,<s%> to love <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> to hold <S%H1692>fast<s%> to <S%H5647>him,<s%> and to serve him with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>"
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H7971>them,<s%> and sent them away; and they <S%H3212>went<s%> to their <S%H168>tents.<s%>

Now to the <S%H2677>one<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> inheritance in <S%H1316>Bashan;<s%> but to the other <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%> Moreover when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> to their <S%H168>tents,<s%> he blessed <S%H1288>them,<s%>

and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H7725>"Return<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5233>wealth<s%> to your <S%H168>tents,<s%> with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with <S%H5178>brass,<s%> with <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H8008>clothing.<s%> <S%H2505>Divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> with your <S%H251>brothers.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3212>departed<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H272>possession,<s%> which they <S%H270>owned,<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

When they <S%H935>came<s%> to the region about the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H4758>to<s%> look <S%H4758>at.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>this,<s%> "Behold, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H4136>forefront<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> in the <S%H1552>region<s%> about the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> on the side that <S%H5676>pertains<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

When the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H5712>it,<s%> the whole congregation of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> against them to <S%H6635>war.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%>

and with him <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5387>princes,<s%> one <S%H5387>prince<s%> of a <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they were <S%H376>everyone<s%> of them <S%H7218>head<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%> among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

They <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H559>them,<s%> saying,

"Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H4604><s%> 'What trespass is this that you have <S%H4603>committed<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in that you have <S%H1129>built<s%> yourselves an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> to <S%H4775>rebel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>

Is the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%> too <S%H4592>little<s%> for <S%H2891>us,<s%> from which we have not cleansed ourselves to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> although there came a <S%H5063>plague<s%> on the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

that you must turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> It will <S%H4775>be,<s%> since you rebel <S%H3117>today<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> he will be <S%H7107>angry<s%> with the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H389>However,<s%> if the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> then pass <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7931>dwells,<s%> and take <S%H270>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H4775>us;<s%> but don't rebel against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against <S%H1129>us,<s%> in building an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H1107>other<s%> than the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H5912>Didn't<s%> Achan the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> in the devoted <S%H2764>thing,<s%> and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>fell<s%> on all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> That <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1478>didn't<s%> perish <S%H259>alone<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>'"

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

"The Mighty <S%H410>One,<s%> God, <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H430><s%> the Mighty <S%H410>One,<s%> God, <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H430><s%> he <S%H3045>knows;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3045>know:<s%> if it was in <S%H4777>rebellion,<s%> or if in <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3467>(don't<s%> save us this <S%H3117>day<s%>),

that we have <S%H1129>built<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> away from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> or if to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> or meal <S%H5930>offering,<s%> or if to <S%H6213>offer<s%> sacrifices of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings,<s%> let <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> himself require <S%H1245>it.<s%>

"If we have not out of <S%H1674>concern<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H1697>this,<s%> and for a <S%H559>reason,<s%> saying, <S%H4279><s%> 'In time to come your <S%H1121>children<s%> might <S%H559>speak<s%> to our <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What have you to do with <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>made<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> a <S%H1366>border<s%> between us and <S%H1121>you,<s%> you children of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad.<s%> You have no <S%H2506>portion<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"' So your <S%H1121>children<s%> might <S%H7673>make<s%> our <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> <S%H1115>from<s%> <S%H3372>fearing<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
"Therefore we <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6213><s%> 'Let's now prepare to <S%H1129>build<s%> ourselves an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> not for burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> nor for <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%>

but it will be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> between us and <S%H1755>you,<s%> and between our generations <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5647>us,<s%> that we may perform the <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him with our burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> with our <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and with our peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%>' that your <S%H1121>children<s%> may not <S%H559>tell<s%> our <S%H1121>children<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H2506><s%> 'You have no portion in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>'

"Therefore we <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'It shall be, when they tell us or our <S%H1755>generations<s%> this in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> that we shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold<s%> the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6213>made,<s%> not for burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> nor for <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> but it is a witness between us and <S%H5707>you.<s%>"'

"Far <S%H2486>be<s%> it from us that we should <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> away this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> for burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> for meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> or for <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> besides the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4908>tabernacle!<s%>"

When <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> even the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were with <S%H8085>him,<s%> heard the <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> it pleased them <S%H3190>well.<s%>

<S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H3117>"Today<s%> we <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4603>us,<s%> because you have not committed this <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H227>Now<s%> you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

<S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes,<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> them <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

The <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and spoke no <S%H559>more<s%> of going <S%H5927>up<s%> against them to <S%H6635>war,<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the children of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H3427>lived.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H7121>named<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> "A <S%H5707>Witness<s%> Between Us that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H430>God.<s%>"
